message: 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.common.condition.ConditionalOnMissingProfile' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.portal.spi.ctrip.CtripEmailRequestBuilder' import. Should be before 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.portal.spi.ctrip.CtripEmailService'.
